role.responsibility: Team rotations, ring reads, third-party escapes
role.lead_when: Rotating to zone, calling macro plays, escaping bad fights
role.follow_when: Taking close-range fights, breaching buildings
role.disengage_when: No ult + 2+ squads nearby, or ring is far and you're low

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold height until team commits; only dive if knock confirmed

passive.name: VTOL Jets
passive.leverage_when: Short repositions, vertical peeks, dodging grenades
passive.do_not_rely_on: Extended combat flights (6s fuel, no mid-air refuel)

tactical.name: Missile Swarm
tactical.notes: No self-damage; 25s CD; 125m range; disables Mantle Boost on hit

ultimate.name: Skyward Dive
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Ring is close + full team is alive + enemies not pushing
ultimate.abort_conditions: Sniper locks on during spin-up OR enemy hard pushes before launch

fight_flow.start: Take height, poke with marksman, scan with missiles
fight_flow.mid_fight: Jets to reposition, short burns for off-angles
fight_flow.exit_reset: Skyward Dive if losing OR third-party incoming; rotate to high ground

rotations.early_game: Land edge, loot fast, scout ring with jets
rotations.mid_game: Use ult proactively for ring positioning (before forced)
rotations.late_game: Hold ult for emergency escape or final ring rotation
rotations.bad_rotation: Walking through open terrain with ult available

primary.reason: S27 buffed, fast TTK, jet-peeking friendly

secondary.reason: Punish from jet angles, no bullet drop issues

common_mistakes: Using ult to push instead of escape/rotate
Jet-peeking with low fuel and getting beamed
Missiles for damage instead of info/suppression
Landing in the open after Skyward Dive
valkyrie.mental_rule: Ult is for leaving, not arriving. Hold height, read zone, extract your team.

map_overrides.height_rules: Prioritize Hammond Labs, Estates rooftops, Phase Runner hill
map_overrides.ult_timing: Save for ring 3+ transitions; too many indoor POIs early

map_overrides.height_rules: Terraformer high ground, Promenades upper levels
map_overrides.ult_timing: More aggressive early rotations okay (open terrain punishes walking)

role.responsibility: Holding space, denying pushes, enabling teammate aggression via speed boost
role.lead_when: Setting up defensive positions, choosing where to anchor
role.follow_when: Team wants to push aggressively (walls take time to deploy)
role.disengage_when: Walls broken + no cover nearby, or ring forces movement

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold until wall charge is banked; commit only with speed boost active

passive.name: Battle Modder
passive.leverage_when: Any LMG fight (reload + mag bonuses), late game (800 HP walls at max Evo)
passive.do_not_rely_on: Early game wall durability (starts weak, scales with Evo)

tactical.name: Amped Cover
tactical.notes: Roof added; shield damage charges 100%, wall damage charges 25%; speed boost for vault

ultimate.name: Mobile Minigun Sheila
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Multiple angles exposed, or team is rotating
ultimate.abort_conditions: Flanked OR wall destroyed while mounted

fight_flow.start: Place walls at choke/angle, poke through amped shield to build charge
fight_flow.mid_fight: Let damage bank, call out when speed boost is ready
fight_flow.exit_reset: Teammates vault for speed boost → sprint to next position

rotations.early_game: Identify anchor spots in zone; place walls preemptively
rotations.mid_game: Bank wall charge during poke, use speed boost for ring transitions
rotations.late_game: Walls are strongest (800 HP) — hold final positions aggressively
rotations.bad_rotation: Walking in the open with no walls placed ahead

primary.reason: Battle Modder synergy (bigger mags, faster reloads)

common_mistakes: Placing walls mid-fight instead of before engagement
Abandoning walls before damage is banked
rampart.rp_loss_behavior: Rotating without walls set up ahead
rampart.mental_rule: Walls first, fight second. Your job is creating space teammates can exploit.

map_overrides.height_rules: Balance rooftop control with indoor wall setups
map_overrides.ult_timing: Sheila in Hammond Labs main room, Oasis chokes

map_overrides.height_rules: Control building interiors, use walls on stairs

role.responsibility: Creating angles, vertical pressure, enabling team wipes with Black Hole
role.lead_when: Taking vertical fights, initiating with ult combos
role.follow_when: Team has better entry for horizontal pushes
role.disengage_when: Grav Lift on CD + no ult + low ground

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit when ult is live and team can follow; hold if lift is down

passive.name: Spacewalk
passive.leverage_when: Post-lift repositions, dropping from height, aggressive air strafes

tactical.name: Gravity Lift
tactical.notes: Lift speed 375, 1.5s hover, 22s effective CD; Newt Scoot = glide after exit

ultimate.name: Black Hole
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Team isn't ready to capitalize, or enemy has easy break angle
ultimate.abort_conditions: Placed in crossfire with no follow-up damage

fight_flow.start: Lift for height, spot enemies, call angles
fight_flow.mid_fight: Black Hole → nade stack OR lift-flick peeks for quick damage
fight_flow.exit_reset: Lift to high ground, Spacewalk soft-landing to cover

rotations.early_game: Aggressive vertical scouting; use lift to check POIs
rotations.mid_game: Save ult for multi-squad fights or third-party opportunities
rotations.late_game: Black Hole for final ring denial; lift for escape when trapped
rotations.bad_rotation: Walking flat terrain with lift on CD and no ult

primary.reason: Fast TTK for lift peeks, good hipfire

secondary.reason: Capitalize on height advantage from lift

common_mistakes: Wasting Black Hole without team follow-up
Staying in lift too long and getting beamed
Using lift aggressively with no escape plan
Placing Black Hole where easily shot
horizon.rp_loss_behavior: Solo Black Hole with no team follow-up
horizon.mental_rule: Lift is your escape first, angle second. Black Hole only when team can capitalize.

map_overrides.height_rules: Dominant on any building; leverage lift for rooftop plays
map_overrides.ult_timing: Black Hole in Hammond chokes, Estates courtyard

map_overrides.height_rules: Lift onto container stacks, Terraformer catwalks
map_overrides.ult_timing: Stasis Net transitions, Breaker Wharf pushes

role.responsibility: Opening fights, diving isolated targets, creating chaos
role.lead_when: Dive opportunities are clear, enemy is separated
role.follow_when: Team has better info/setup
role.disengage_when: Pounce is down + team not with you + enemy squad is full

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit only on isolated targets; hold if they're grouped

passive.name: Assassin / Stalker
passive.leverage_when: Flanking via unlimited climbing, silent crouch approaches

tactical.name: Shadow Pounce
tactical.notes: S27 nerfed max velocity — still strong close-mid, weaker extreme range

ultimate.name: Forged Shadows / Death Totem
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemy has clear totem snipe angle, or team is split
ultimate.abort_conditions: Totem is spotted before push completes

fight_flow.start: Climb for angle → Shadow Pounce onto isolated target
fight_flow.mid_fight: Immediate weapon dump, confirm knock fast
fight_flow.exit_reset: Pounce back to team OR use ult safety

rotations.early_game: Aggressive POI clearing; pounce through buildings
rotations.mid_game: Look for third-party dive opportunities; let team poke, you finish
rotations.late_game: More conservative — dive only when knock is guaranteed
rotations.bad_rotation: Pouncing into a 3-stack without team backup

primary.reason: S27 hold-to-burst shreds at pounce range

common_mistakes: Pouncing into full squads instead of isolated players
Overcommitting when pounce is on cooldown
Forgetting you're squishy without ult protection
revenant.mental_rule: Pounce is for isolated kills, not team fights. In, kill, out.

map_overrides.height_rules: Climb exterior walls for roof entries; pounce through skylights
map_overrides.ult_timing: Totem behind cover in Gardens, Oasis

map_overrides.height_rules: Climb every building; pounce between rooftops
map_overrides.ult_timing: Totem in back rooms during Fragment chaos

role.responsibility: Safe rotations, team extraction, intel via voices
role.follow_when: Entry frags - let aggro legends dive first
role.disengage_when: Voices warn, no phase available, team down

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with phase available; hold if both abilities on CD

passive.name: Voices from the Void
passive.leverage_when: Rotating through danger, checking for snipers

tactical.name: Into the Void
tactical.notes: 2.5s activation; use preemptively, not when already cracked

ultimate.name: Dimensional Rift
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemy follows immediately - don't lead them to team

fight_flow.start: Portal team to position, phase to scout angles
fight_flow.mid_fight: Hold phase for escape, play cover aggressively
fight_flow.exit_reset: Phase out → portal team to safety

rotations.early_game: Edge landing, portal for quick rotations
rotations.mid_game: Save portal for ring or third-party escape
rotations.late_game: Portal is premium - use for final repositions only
rotations.bad_rotation: Walking open ground with portal available

common_mistakes: Phasing too late when already one-shot
wraith.mental_rule: Portal is your team's insurance. Phase is YOUR insurance. Don't waste either.

role.responsibility: Vertical control, team rotations via zipline, beacon scanning
role.follow_when: Close-quarters building fights
role.disengage_when: Grapple on CD + low ground + team not with you

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with grapple available; hold height otherwise

passive.name: Insider Knowledge
passive.leverage_when: Every beacon scan reduces ult CD

tactical.name: Grappling Hook
tactical.notes: 10-30s CD based on distance; save for escape in late game

ultimate.name: Zipline Gun
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies watching - ziplines are death traps
ultimate.abort_conditions: Never zipline into a team that's aiming at endpoint

fight_flow.start: Grapple to height, poke with marksman
fight_flow.mid_fight: Short grapples for repositions, hold angles
fight_flow.exit_reset: Zipline team to safety, grapple as personal escape

rotations.early_game: Scan beacons, use ziplines for fast loot routes
rotations.mid_game: Zipline team to ring, grapple to scout
rotations.late_game: Ziplines become risky - use grapple more
rotations.bad_rotation: Zipline directly into contested zone

common_mistakes: Wasting grapple for loot instead of fights
Not scanning beacons for ult CD reduction
pathfinder.rp_loss_behavior: Zipline into a team that's already aiming at you
pathfinder.mental_rule: Height wins fights. Grapple is your get-out-of-jail card. Ziplines are team tools, not personal taxis.

role.responsibility: Intel gathering, tracking enemies, enabling team pushes
role.lead_when: Scanning for info, ult hunting mode
role.follow_when: Team needs you alive for scans, not fragging
role.disengage_when: Ult down + no scan + enemies unknown

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit during ult; hold for scans otherwise

passive.name: Tracker
passive.leverage_when: Reading enemy movements, predicting rotations

tactical.name: Eye of the Allfather
tactical.notes: 25s CD; reveals through walls for 3s; use before pushing

ultimate.name: Beast of the Hunt
ultimate.do_not_use_when: No enemies nearby, or saving for placement
ultimate.abort_conditions: Team not ready to follow your aggression

fight_flow.start: Scan → call positions → team pushes
fight_flow.mid_fight: Ult for speed + constant scans (5s CD during ult)
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult speed to disengage, scan to check if chased

rotations.early_game: Track enemies, scan contested POIs
rotations.mid_game: Scan before entering any POI
rotations.late_game: Ult conservatively - it's your best third-party tool
rotations.bad_rotation: Walking blind when scan is available

secondary.reason: Fast downs during Beast of Hunt

common_mistakes: Scanning when not ready to act on info
Ignoring tracks in favor of random rotations
bloodhound.mental_rule: Information is power. Scan before you act. Hunt with your team, not alone.

role.responsibility: Keeping team alive, revives, health economy
role.lead_when: Never - you're too valuable to die first
role.follow_when: Always - stay alive to revive
role.disengage_when: Team is down and you can't safely revive

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold and support; commit only to finish

passive.name: Combat Revive
passive.leverage_when: Teammate down behind cover - drone revives while you fight

tactical.name: D.O.C. Heal Drone
tactical.notes: Use in cover between fights; don't deploy mid-gunfight

ultimate.name: Care Package
ultimate.abort_conditions: Package reveals position - don't call in contested areas

fight_flow.start: Stay behind team, poke from safety
fight_flow.mid_fight: Revive downed teammates, drone between engagements
fight_flow.exit_reset: Revive → heal → reposition

rotations.early_game: Care package early for gear advantage
rotations.mid_game: Drone during downtime, position for revive access
rotations.late_game: Your survival = team survival; play back
rotations.bad_rotation: Being first into danger

lifeline.rp_loss_behavior: Dying before you can revive your team
lifeline.mental_rule: Dead Lifeline = dead team. Your job is staying alive and keeping others alive.

role.responsibility: Team protection, bubble fights, area denial with ult
role.follow_when: Team rotating - you're too slow to be first
role.disengage_when: No bubble, no ult, outnumbered

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with bubble; hold otherwise

passive.name: Gun Shield + Fortified
passive.leverage_when: 1v1 gunfights, absorbing initial damage
passive.do_not_rely_on: Gun shield vs snipers - one tap breaks it

tactical.name: Dome of Protection
tactical.notes: 12s duration; use for revives, reloads, resets

ultimate.name: Defensive Bombardment
ultimate.abort_conditions: Team is in the blast zone

fight_flow.start: Absorb damage with gun shield, call bubble location
fight_flow.mid_fight: Bubble dance - in/out for heals and peeks
fight_flow.exit_reset: Bubble → revive → ult to cover escape

rotations.early_game: Slow but safe - bubble if caught out
rotations.mid_game: Position early in zone, bubble holds
rotations.late_game: Bubble is god-tier for final ring
rotations.bad_rotation: Running in open without bubble ready

common_mistakes: Bubble too early or too late
ADS peeking with broken gun shield
Playing too aggressive for big hitbox
gibraltar.rp_loss_behavior: Getting caught in open without bubble
gibraltar.mental_rule: You are the shield. Bubble saves teams. Don't throw your life for frags.

role.responsibility: Team cover, disengages, zoning with ult
role.follow_when: Let recon lead - you provide cover
role.disengage_when: No smokes, ult down, team cracked

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with smokes ready; hold for repositions

passive.name: Double Time
passive.leverage_when: Getting shot = speed boost for escape
passive.do_not_rely_on: Always being shot - still need cover

tactical.name: Smoke Launcher
tactical.notes: 2 charges; use for escape, revives, or pushing

ultimate.name: Rolling Thunder
ultimate.abort_conditions: Friendlies caught in stun zone

fight_flow.start: Smoke angles, take poke shots
fight_flow.mid_fight: Smoke cracked teammates, use passive for repositions
fight_flow.exit_reset: Smoke wall → ult → run

rotations.early_game: Smoke rotations through open ground
rotations.mid_game: Save smokes for emergencies
rotations.late_game: Ult for zone denial, smokes for resets
rotations.bad_rotation: Smoking your own team's sightlines

common_mistakes: Smoking your team instead of enemies
Not using passive speed for escapes
bangalore.rp_loss_behavior: Smoking your own team's angles mid-fight
bangalore.mental_rule: Smoke is for problems, not paranoia. Ult zones enemies out, not your team in.

role.responsibility: Area denial, building lockdown, endgame dominance
role.follow_when: Team secures buildings for you to trap
role.disengage_when: In the open without traps placed

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold buildings; commit only with gas advantage

passive.name: Nox Vision
passive.leverage_when: Fighting in your own gas

tactical.name: Nox Gas Trap
tactical.notes: 6 max; trap doors, corners, revives

ultimate.name: Nox Gas Grenade
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemies can easily escape the radius

fight_flow.start: Pre-trap building, wait for enemies
fight_flow.mid_fight: Fight in gas, vision + damage advantage
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to block pursuit, trap escape routes

rotations.early_game: Find a building, trap it, hold
rotations.mid_game: Move to ring early, re-trap new position
rotations.late_game: Final ring insider = almost guaranteed win
rotations.bad_rotation: Open field fighting

caustic.rp_loss_behavior: Taking open-field fights with no traps
caustic.mental_rule: Gas is your terrain advantage. If you're not in gas, you're at a disadvantage.

role.responsibility: Confusion, 1v1 wins, clutch revives
role.follow_when: Team initiates - you clean up confused enemies
role.disengage_when: Decoys not working, enemies are tracking you

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with ult; hold otherwise

passive.name: Now You See Me
passive.leverage_when: Invisible revive in smoke/chaos

tactical.name: Psyche Out
tactical.notes: 15s CD; send before peeking to draw fire

ultimate.name: Life of the Party
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemy has Bloodhound/Seer - they see real you

fight_flow.start: Decoy to draw fire, locate enemy
fight_flow.mid_fight: Ult for confusion, secure 1v1s
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult → invisible crawl/revive

rotations.early_game: Decoy ahead while looting
rotations.mid_game: Decoy for intel on POIs
rotations.late_game: Ult for repositions and confusion
rotations.bad_rotation: Sending decoys that obviously run into walls

mirage.rp_loss_behavior: Sending decoys into walls and getting tracked anyway
mirage.mental_rule: Confusion wins fights. Make them shoot at nothing, then punish the reload.

role.responsibility: Fast rotations, first in, creating chaos
role.follow_when: Team is holding position
role.disengage_when: Low HP from stim, team not following

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with pad; hold if you need health

passive.name: Swift Mend
passive.leverage_when: Downtime regen, save heals for teammates

tactical.name: Stim
tactical.notes: 30% speed, costs 20 HP; don't stim at low health

ultimate.name: Launch Pad
ultimate.abort_conditions: Team not ready to follow pad push

fight_flow.start: Pad in → stim → land on isolated target
fight_flow.mid_fight: Stim strafe, be unpredictable
fight_flow.exit_reset: Pad out, passive regen

rotations.early_game: Fast loot, pad to next POI
rotations.mid_game: Pad for rotations, save for third-parties
rotations.late_game: Pad becomes risky - less predictable landings
rotations.bad_rotation: Pad into a team that's already aiming

common_mistakes: Not waiting for team before pad push
octane.rp_loss_behavior: Pad pushing into 3-stack while team is looting
octane.mental_rule: Speed is for creating opportunities, not for solo hero plays.

role.responsibility: Building lockdown, nade denial, endgame fortress
role.lead_when: Never - you set up, you don't push
role.follow_when: Team secures position for you to fortify
role.disengage_when: Position compromised, no fences set

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold always; commit only when fences secure retreat

passive.name: Spark of Genius
passive.leverage_when: Ultimate Accelerants give full ult

tactical.name: Perimeter Security
tactical.notes: 12 nodes max; fence doors, chokes, flanks

ultimate.name: Interception Pylon
ultimate.do_not_use_when: About to rotate - it doesn't move
ultimate.abort_conditions: Pylon exposed to enemy fire

fight_flow.start: Set fences, pylon behind cover
fight_flow.mid_fight: Fight from fenced position, pylon blocks nades
fight_flow.exit_reset: Fence retreat paths, pylon for reset

rotations.early_game: Loot ultimate accelerants, find position early
rotations.mid_game: Rotate early to new position, re-fence
rotations.late_game: Pylon + fences = nearly unbreakable hold
rotations.bad_rotation: Running in open with no fences up

wattson.rp_loss_behavior: Getting pushed before fences are up
wattson.mental_rule: Your fortress takes time to build. Get there early or don't go at all.

role.responsibility: Intel, EMP initiation, banner recovery
role.follow_when: Drone scouting ahead of team
role.disengage_when: Drone destroyed, no intel, team pushing without you

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit after EMP; hold while droning

passive.name: Neurolink
passive.leverage_when: Drone pings share with team
passive.do_not_rely_on: Passive intel - need active drone control

tactical.name: Surveillance Drone
tactical.notes: Use before pushes; don't drone mid-fight

ultimate.name: Drone EMP
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Drone position gives it away early
ultimate.abort_conditions: Team not ready to push post-EMP

fight_flow.start: Drone scout → EMP → team pushes cracked enemies
fight_flow.mid_fight: Gun out, fight with team - no droning
fight_flow.exit_reset: Drone to check pursuit, banner grab if needed

rotations.early_game: Drone banners for squad count
rotations.mid_game: EMP for third-party initiations
rotations.late_game: EMP timing is everything
rotations.bad_rotation: Droning while team is fighting

common_mistakes: Forgetting to check banners for squad count
crypto.mental_rule: EMP starts fights. Guns finish them. Put the drone away when shooting.

role.responsibility: Loot economy, team gear, repositions
role.follow_when: Team needs loot - you provide
role.disengage_when: Bracelet on CD, exposed position

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold for loot value; commit with bracelet available

passive.name: Eye for Quality
passive.leverage_when: Seeing purple/gold through walls

tactical.name: Burglar's Best Friend
tactical.notes: 30s CD; visible trail - use for escape, not aggression

ultimate.name: Black Market Boutique
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies nearby - they steal your loot
ultimate.abort_conditions: Position gives away your location

fight_flow.start: Bracelet to high ground, poke
fight_flow.mid_fight: Bracelet for repositions, not escapes yet
fight_flow.exit_reset: Bracelet out, shop for heals/ammo

rotations.early_game: Shop every POI for fast gear
rotations.mid_game: Shop for ammo/meds during downtime
rotations.late_game: Bracelet is escape only; save it
rotations.bad_rotation: Bracelet into enemies instead of away

loba.rp_loss_behavior: Bracelet into a trap instead of away from danger
loba.mental_rule: Shop keeps your team loaded. Bracelet keeps YOU alive. Don't waste either.

role.responsibility: Grenade spam, area denial, flushing cover
role.follow_when: Team needs sustained damage, not aggro entry
role.disengage_when: No nades, no ult, enemies closing distance

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold for nade spam; commit only when enemies flushed

passive.name: Grenadier
passive.leverage_when: Extra nade slot, faster throws, longer range
passive.do_not_rely_on: Arc star sticks at max range

tactical.name: Knuckle Cluster
tactical.notes: 2 charges; flush cover, block doorways, stack damage

ultimate.name: The Motherlode
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemies already outside the ring area

fight_flow.start: Nade spam → knuckle cluster → highlight damaged targets
fight_flow.mid_fight: Constant cluster pressure, nade every opportunity
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to zone pursuit, nade doorways

rotations.early_game: Hoard grenades - you use them better
rotations.mid_game: Ult for third-party engagements
rotations.late_game: Ult denies final ring space
rotations.bad_rotation: Out of grenades

common_mistakes: Knuckle cluster at max range misses
fuse.rp_loss_behavior: No grenades left when you need them
fuse.mental_rule: Explosives everywhere. If they're behind cover, they're taking damage anyway.

role.responsibility: Precise intel, interrupt heals, track enemies through fights
role.follow_when: Team pushes - your info enables them
role.disengage_when: No ult, no tactical, blind fighting

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with info; hold to scan first

passive.name: Heart Seeker
passive.leverage_when: ADS to detect enemies within 75m

tactical.name: Focus of Attention
tactical.notes: Interrupts heals/revives; 8s reveal; narrow tunnel

ultimate.name: Exhibit
ultimate.abort_conditions: Dome placed where enemies won't fight

fight_flow.start: Passive → tactical confirm → call push
fight_flow.mid_fight: Interrupt heals with tactical, constant info
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to see pursuit, passive to track

rotations.early_game: Heart sensor while looting
rotations.mid_game: Ult for contested POI fights
rotations.late_game: Ult in final ring = total awareness
rotations.bad_rotation: Pushing without using passive first

seer.rp_loss_behavior: Pushing blind when you have wallhacks
seer.mental_rule: You see everything. There's no excuse for getting surprised.

role.responsibility: Aggressive portals, death box tracking, snare enemies
role.follow_when: Team isn't ready for instant aggression
role.disengage_when: Ult down, snare down, team not following

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with ult; hold without it

passive.name: Marked for Death
passive.leverage_when: Map shows death boxes, interact to find attackers
passive.do_not_rely_on: Old death boxes - info goes stale

tactical.name: Arc Snare
tactical.notes: Tether + damage; use to catch runners or start fights

ultimate.name: Phase Breach
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemies waiting on other side - you're one-way

fight_flow.start: Snare → phase breach → instant pressure
fight_flow.mid_fight: Snare fleeing enemies, aggressive pushes
fight_flow.exit_reset: Phase breach to cover - one-way is risky for reset

rotations.early_game: Check map for death boxes, third-party
rotations.mid_game: Phase breach for quick rotations
rotations.late_game: Phase breach = instant final fight entry
rotations.bad_rotation: Phase breach with team not following

primary.reason: Fast TTK on phase breach entry

common_mistakes: Snare on full health enemies far away
Not checking death boxes for intel
ash.mental_rule: Phase Breach is a one-way ticket. Make sure your team has tickets too.

role.responsibility: Aggressive pushing, flushing cover, shotgun rushing
role.follow_when: Team needs poke, not aggression
role.disengage_when: Drill down, ball down, team not following

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with ball; hold if cooldowns down

passive.name: Warlord's Ire
passive.leverage_when: Shotgun speed boost, highlight damaged enemies

tactical.name: Riot Drill
tactical.notes: Drill through walls/doors; flush cover

ultimate.name: Wrecking Ball
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies in the open - ball less effective
ultimate.abort_conditions: Ball bouncing away from target

fight_flow.start: Ball → drill cover → shotgun rush
fight_flow.mid_fight: Drill walls, speed boost with shotgun
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ball for speed, drill to delay pursuit

rotations.early_game: Aggressive POI clear with drill
rotations.mid_game: Ball for fast rotations
rotations.late_game: Ball into final ring for instant chaos
rotations.bad_rotation: No shotgun = no passive value

mad_maggie.mental_rule: You are the breach. Shotgun in hand, ball rolling, drill burning. Go.

role.responsibility: Mobile protection, revive cover, team shields
role.follow_when: Team rotates - you protect the move
role.disengage_when: Shield broken, ult down, team scattered

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold with shields; commit to revive/protect

passive.name: Retrieve the Wounded
passive.leverage_when: Dragging downed teammates to safety

tactical.name: Mobile Shield
tactical.notes: Controllable shield wall; throw and direct

ultimate.name: Castle Wall
ultimate.abort_conditions: Wall placed in wrong direction

fight_flow.start: Shield out, team pokes from behind
fight_flow.mid_fight: Revive under shield, reposition wall
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult for cover, drag/revive downed teammates

rotations.early_game: Mobile shield for safe rotations
rotations.mid_game: Ult for ring positioning
rotations.late_game: Castle Wall = final ring fortress
rotations.bad_rotation: Rotating without shield ready

newcastle.rp_loss_behavior: Teammate dies when you could have shielded them
newcastle.mental_rule: You are the team's armor. Position yourself between enemies and allies.

role.responsibility: Long-range damage, target highlighting, rotations via Echo
role.follow_when: Close range fights - sniper isn't ideal
role.disengage_when: Echo down, no sniper ammo, enemies closing gap

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold for sniper value; commit only when enemies cracked

passive.name: Spotter's Lens
passive.leverage_when: ADS any scope shows enemy info + team ping

tactical.name: Echo Relocation
tactical.notes: Launch to Echo's position; reposition or escape

ultimate.name: Sniper's Mark
ultimate.abort_conditions: Enemies behind full cover

fight_flow.start: Mark targets with ult, team follows up
fight_flow.mid_fight: Sniper shots on marked enemies
fight_flow.exit_reset: Echo to height or cover

rotations.early_game: Echo scout, sniper from distance
rotations.mid_game: Third-party from sightlines
rotations.late_game: Sniper less effective in tight rings
rotations.bad_rotation: Getting caught in close range without Echo

vantage.rp_loss_behavior: Sniping while team dies in close combat
vantage.mental_rule: Your ult is your primary. Mark first, shoot second. Echo is your escape.

role.responsibility: Building lockdown, door reinforcement, wall denial
role.follow_when: Team secures position for you to reinforce
role.disengage_when: Position overrun, no ferrofluid left

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold always; commit only behind wall

passive.name: Barricade
passive.leverage_when: Reinforce doors against kick/punch/breach
passive.do_not_rely_on: Grenades - they still break reinforced doors

tactical.name: Piercing Spikes
tactical.notes: Ferrofluid on floor; slows + damages + blinds

ultimate.name: Dark Veil
ultimate.abort_conditions: Wall placed where team needs to shoot through

fight_flow.start: Reinforced doors, spikes on entries, wall to split
fight_flow.mid_fight: Fight behind wall, spikes on pushers
fight_flow.exit_reset: Wall to block pursuit, spikes on chase paths

rotations.early_game: Find building, reinforce, hold
rotations.mid_game: Rotate early to new position
rotations.late_game: Wall + spikes = near-impenetrable
rotations.bad_rotation: Open field with no walls

catalyst.rp_loss_behavior: Wall placed blocking your own team
catalyst.mental_rule: Control the space. Wall splits fights. Spikes punish aggression.

role.responsibility: Weapon versatility, team reload support, third weapon
role.follow_when: Team needs sustained damage support
role.disengage_when: Ult down, sling down, out of ammo

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with ult active; hold otherwise

passive.name: Sling
passive.leverage_when: Third weapon slot, quick swap in ult

tactical.name: Whistler
tactical.notes: Enemy gun overheats if firing; use on aggressive pushers

ultimate.name: Tempest
ultimate.abort_conditions: Running in without ammo

fight_flow.start: Whistler on pusher → ult → three weapons
fight_flow.mid_fight: Infinite ammo, faster reloads, weapon spam
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult over, swap to sling for escape weapon

rotations.early_game: Loot third weapon for sling
rotations.mid_game: Ult for major engagements
rotations.late_game: Ult timing is everything
rotations.bad_rotation: No ammo for all three weapons

ballistic.rp_loss_behavior: Ult ends and you're out of ammo for all three guns
ballistic.mental_rule: Three guns, infinite ammo during ult. Be the one-man army.

role.responsibility: Team shields, emergency protection, keeping team topped off
role.follow_when: Always - your shields keep pushers alive
role.disengage_when: No tactical charge, team overextended

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Hold for shield value; commit to save cracked teammate

passive.name: Savior's Speed
passive.leverage_when: Running toward hurt teammates gives speed boost
passive.do_not_rely_on: Always being close enough to teammates

tactical.name: Radiant Transfer
tactical.notes: Regenerates ally shields temporarily; use on cracked teammate

ultimate.name: Energy Barricade
ultimate.do_not_use_when: Wide open areas - shields get destroyed
ultimate.abort_conditions: Shields placed in crossfire

fight_flow.start: Position behind team, prep tactical
fight_flow.mid_fight: Shield cracked teammates, ult for protection
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult shields for retreat cover

rotations.early_game: Loot for shield cells to charge tactical
rotations.mid_game: Stay with team, shield on demand
rotations.late_game: Ult for final positioning
rotations.bad_rotation: Ahead of team instead of behind

conduit.rp_loss_behavior: Team dies cracked while your tactical is ready
conduit.mental_rule: Your shields win fights. Stay alive, keep teammates shielded.

role.responsibility: Void rotations, team extraction, death box looting
role.follow_when: Entry frags - let aggro legends go first
role.disengage_when: No tactical, no ult, portals gone

positioning.commit_vs_hold: Commit with portal ready; hold if cooldowns down

passive.name: Gift from the Rift
passive.leverage_when: Loot one item from any death box remotely

tactical.name: Void Passage
tactical.notes: Two-way portal through walls; team can use both ways

ultimate.name: Void Nexus
ultimate.abort_conditions: Team not aware of recall timer

fight_flow.start: Portal team to position
fight_flow.mid_fight: Tactical for quick repositions/escapes
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult beacon for team recall

rotations.early_game: Passive loot death boxes from distance
rotations.mid_game: Ult as reset point for risky pushes
rotations.late_game: Portal for final ring positioning
rotations.bad_rotation: Ult in exposed location

alter.rp_loss_behavior: Ult placed where enemies camp you on return
alter.mental_rule: Portals are for escaping problems, not creating them. Ult is your team's insurance policy.
